title: My Wolf King
description: When plus-sized Carole Anne Boswick discovers an injured naked man in her yard, she knows she's in trouble. Alexander is hot, cocky, and full of swagger. He's a werewolf with the body of a sex god... and he's determined to have her.Alexander is used to being in control. As the King of Wolves he has to be. But his control is shot at the first scent of his mate. He wants her in his home and in his bed as the Queen of Wolves, but Carole Anne has other ideas.The panther shifters are after his mate, and she's refusing his protection. Nobody ever told him that a mating would be so hard. But Alexander isn't about to admit defeat. He's an alpha on a mission to claim his female, and Carole Anne is in heat.For him...
author: Rose Wynters
